texts.es: El grupo solidario está integrado por tres socias trabajadoras, coordinado por la señora Isidra, 43 años y casada madre de 4 hijos es propietaria de una dulcería en su domicilio y los comercializa de manera ambulante en las calles de su comunidad. el créditpo lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como es azúcar, aceite, canela,  harina, papaya, vasos descartables, cucharas, bolsas, etc.Los otros integrantes son la señora Rosa de 45 años dedicada a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas y el señor Antonio de 42 años propietario de una pulpería en el domicilio.
texts.en:
The solidarity group is made up of three working members, coordinated by Isidra who is 43 years old, married and the mother of four children. She owns a candy store in her home and walks around selling them in the streets of her community. 

She is requesting the loan to buy raw materials, such as sugar, oil, cinnamon, flour, papaya, disposable cups, spoons, bags, etc.

The other members are Rosa who is 45 years old and raises pigs and chickens and Antonio who is 42 years old and owns a small grocery store in his home.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, such as sugar, oil, cinnamon, flour, papaya, disposable cups, spoons, bags, etc. for making candy.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas Group

texts.es:
Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas
Fray Casiano Puntarenas

	Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas presenta la solicitud de crédito de 8 integrantes,  quienes han trabajan en una comunidad de Puntarenas (Fray Casiano) con altos niveles de pobreza. El  grupo de mujeres en la zona mantiene un  ahorro y participan en las actividades grupales para la generación de ingresos.  Tienen 8 años de trabajar en sus actividades, han solicitado préstamos y conocen la modalidad de trabajo grupal.  Se forma la Junta Directiva y se levanta el acta No.3 de solicitud de crédito del Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas, en esta oportunidad la  presidenta es Kattia.

	Su trabajo y esfuerzo,  les ha permitido tener su  actividad consolidada como es el  comercio en general (venta de ropa, zapatos, perfumes y otros).  El préstamo va a contribuir a mejorar las condiciones de trabajo de su grupo,  les va a permitir invertir para medio año, incrementando su inventario y cubriendo pedidos para la  época de vacaciones de medio año y día del padre.

	 Realizan la recuperación de la cuota en forma semanal lo que les permite tener un margen más amplio del pago a realizar, la cual se comprometen a cancelar en un plazo de 8 meses. 

Algunas de ellas son mujeres jefas de hogar, tal es el caso de Kattia, quién se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos en la zona, la va a traer a San José y realiza viajes a la frontera con Panamá, es apoyada por su esposo y mantiene una cartera de clientes grande, tiene 35 años y es una mujer trabajadora y de respeto en la comunidad. Además de atender sus actividades económicas por las tardes, también ve  a sus hijos y  cumplen con  las reuniones grupales. 

	El objetivo es mejorar las condiciones de sus empresas, obteniendo un financiamiento acorde con sus necesidades y apoyar el desarrollo de la zona  y por su puesto  mejorar la calidad de vida  de las familias. El nombre del grupo las motiva a ser mejores cada día, Mujeres Esforzadas.
texts.en:
Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas
Fray Casiano Puntarenas

	Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas presents the loan request of eight members, who work in a community in Puntarenas (Fray Casiano) with high poverty levels. The group of women in the zone keep savings and participate in group activities to generate income. They have done the same work for eight years, they have requested loans, and they know how to work in a group. They have formed a Board of Directors and created the third loan request from Banco Mujer Mujeres Esforzadas. Kattia is currently the president.

Her work and effort have allowed her to consolidate her activity, which is trading in general (selling clothing, shoes, perfumes, etc). The loan will go towards improving her group's working conditions. It will allow them to invest for half a year, increasing their inventory and covering orders for the mid-year vacations and Father's Day.

They collect the payments weekly, which allows them to have a larger payment margin, and they commit to paying off the loan within eight months. 

Some of the women are heads of household; such is the case of Kattia, who works selling clothes and shoes in the area. She will bring merchandise to San José and travel to the border with Panama. She is supported by her husband and keeps a long list of clients. She is 35 years old, a hardworking woman, and respected in the community. Apart from working in the afternoons, she also sees her children and attends the group meetings.

The objective is to improve the conditions of their businesses. Getting a loan is appropriate to their needs, contributes to the development of the area, and, of course, improves the quality of life of their families. The name of their group motivates them to be better every day, Mujeres Esforzadas (Hardworking Women).

loans.use: to buy merchandise, clothes, shoes, perfumes

loans.name: Cecilia Eva

texts.en:
Cecilia Eva is 44 years old and married with four children who are in school. Cecilia Eva works very hard to provide for them.

Cecilia Eva's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Cecilia Eva has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Cecilia Eva has taken a PHP 9,970 housing loan through NWTF to rebuild her family home. She is using the this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Cecilia Eva is committed to rebuilding her devastated life. Eventually, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Edith Yaneth

texts.es:
Edith, se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para surtir el inventario del negocio comprara leña, maíz, bolsas, papel y variedad de ropa con ello seguirá trabajando y satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes.
Con el préstamo anterior fortaleció lo necesario el negocio de tal forma que su producción aumento, ha tenido mejor rentabilidad y ofrece a su familia un estilo de vida más digno.
texts.en:
Edith needs to request a new loan to stock her business. She will buy firewood, corn, paper, and a variety of clothing. With this investment, she will continue working and satisfying her customers' needs.
With her previous loan she strengthened her business where necessary such that her production increased. She has had better profitability and now provides her family with a more dignified lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, bags, paper, and a variety of clothing.

loans.name: Leticia Nathaly

texts.es:
Leticia, es una persona dedica a buscar el bienestar de su familia por esa razón hace un tiempo se decidió por abrir una pupusería, para generar otros ingresos que le ayuden a cubrir los gastos familiares, su horario de trabajo es de seis de la tarde a ocho de la noche. Leticia está acompañada y es madre de una niña de tres años de edad.
Requiere capital para comprar chicharrón, quesillo, harina, repollo, aderezos, bebidas y pagara la reparación de un freezer, contara con los insumos para preparar la venta y los conservara por mucho más tiempo, su objetivo es mejorar el servicio, atraer más clientes, aumentar sus ventas y ganancias.
Su sueño es seguir creciendo con el negocio para que su situación económica sea más estable y pueda respaldar el pago de la deuda adquirida así como también brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Leticia is married and the mother of a 3-year-old daughter. She is dedicated to the well-being of her family. For this reason, she decided to open her own business selling pupusas (a typical Salvadorean dish) to generate additional income that would help to cover her family's expenses. Leticia works from 6 p.m.to 8 p.m. She is in need of capital to buy pig skins, cheese, flour, cabbage, salad dressings, soft drinks, and to pay to have a freezer repaired. This freezer will help her to keep her ingredients longer and the ingredients will help her to prepare more pupusas. 

Leticia's goal is to improve her service, attract more customers, and increase her sales and income. Her dream is to continue growing her business so that her financial situation becomes more stable and she is able to pay off her debts from her loans. In this way, she will also be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pig skins, cheese, flour, cabbage, salad dressings, soft drinks, and to pay to have a freezer repaired.

loans.name: Burulbubu

texts.ru: Бурулбубу, 57 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Бурулбубу- средне-специальное медицинское образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1977 году. Благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию, Бурулбубу на сегодняшний день имеет: 2 дойные  коровы, 5 овец и 6 коз. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бурулбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000сом (KGS) для закупки овец, от реализации которых она сможет получить большую прибыль, что приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Бурулбубу планирует вложить в постройку нового дома.
texts.en:
Burulbubu is 57 years old, married and raising five children together with her husband. Burulbubu has vocational medical education. As an additional source of income for her family, she works with field crop cultivation and livestock breeding, after having started with this in 1977. Thanks to her purposefulness and hard work, Burulbubu currenly has two dairy cows, five sheep and six goats. The monthly income is around 10,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Burulbubu turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase sheep, which she will can get a high income from selling. Thsi will go to increasing the family's capital. Burulbubu plans to invest the income from the loan in building a new home.

loans.use: To purchase sheep

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor de 55 años de edad, es padre de 3 hijos,  uno de 25 años con estudios superiores,  otro está en la capital del país y trabaja en un laboratorio y el ultimo estaba estudiando 2° año de bachillerato;  pero no continua desde que murió su mamá y el padece de una enfermedad por esa razón y se agudizo el problema.
Víctor trabaja de albañil desde hace varios años, también se dedica a vender pan y galletas viaja hasta la capital del país a traer este producto. 
El cliente tiene muchos años de trabajo en albañilería desde que tenía 20 años de edad,  también el cliente aprendió este trabajo primero andando de ayudante de albañil, luego fue aprendiendo el oficio.  Cuando no tiene trabajo de albañil trabajo vendiendo pan y galletas y tambien trabaja la agricultura para producir el maíz que es parte de su dieta alimenticia.
El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar semilla, fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas y el resto para cancelar un crédito con la institución.   
Él comenta que desea ver a sus hijos con un trabajo estable y a la vez casado con un buen hogar, como todo padre es lo que desea ver a sus hijos estables.
El préstamo le ayudara a pelear esta dura vida que está en todo el mundo,  pero con la ayuda de Dios y KIVA todo saldrá bien.
texts.en:
Víctor is 55 years old, the father of 3 children. One of them is 25 and is studying at College, the next is in the Capital working in a laboratory and the last was studying in his second year of Secondary school, but hasn't continued since his mother died and he got sick.

Victor has worked as a bricklayer for various years and he also sells bread and cookies. He travels to the capital to get these products. He has worked as a bricklayer since he was 20. He first worked as an assistant to a bricklayer and learned the trade. When he does have work he sells bread and cookies and also works on agriculture to produce corn that is part of a daily diet.

The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides and the rest is to pay a loan he has with the institution. He comments that he wants to see his children with stable jobs and married with a good home as all fathers want to see their children do well.

The loan will help him fight the hard life that this world is, and with the help of God and Kiva everything will turn out well.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides and the rest to pay off another loan.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Carlos Ándres

texts.es:
Carlos de 19 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, es soltero,  vive solo, ya que su madre está en USA y su padre tiene negocio propio. Carlos es empleado, tiene dos años de trabajar en la empresa, aparte de eso se dedica a la  ganadería, él viaja al trabajo en bus urbano  todos los días. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar ganado para engordarlo y luego venderlo, será satisfecha una necesidad ya que podrá engordar ganado y venderlos en un tiempo determinado para tener más ingresos. 

Él sueña en un futuro que su ganado crezca en buenas condiciones y se desarrollen bien y así tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Carlos, age 19, has a bachelor's degree. He is single and lives alone because his mother is in the USA. His father has his own business. 
Carlos is employed. He has been working for a business for two years. He also works in livestock. He travels to work by city bus every day.
He will use this loan to purchase livestock to fatten and later sell. He will thus satisfy a need. He will be able to fatten and then sell them after a specific time in order to have a greater income.
For the future, he dreams of his livestock growing in good conditions and developing well so that he can have more income.

loans.use: to buy livestock to fatten and later sell.

loans.name: Sharshenkul

texts.ru: Шаршенкуль 54 года, вдова, мать 3 детей. У Шаршенкуль - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1998 году с 5,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности, трудолюбию и ответственности Шаршенкуль, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 1 дойная корова, 3 теленка, 8 овец, 1 лошадь и 1 жеребенок. Для содержания скота есть просторный сарай, корм и сено также заготовлены. Дополнительно Шаршенкуль со своей семьей занимается полеводством, на земельном участке в 1,20 ГА выращивают клевер, свеклу, фасоль для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шаршенкуль обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для закупки коров, часть средств она потратит на покупку минеральных удобрений и семян элитных сортов. Шаршенкуль намерена увеличить поголовье скота, что приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит накопить средства на женитьбу сына.
texts.en:
Sharshenkul is 54 years old, a widow, and the mother of three children. Sharshenkul has secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Sharshenkul works with field crop cultivation and livestock breeding, after having started in 1998 with 5,000 som (KGS). 

Thanks to Sharshenkul's purposefulness, hard work and responsibility, she currently has a dairy cow, three calves, eight sheep, one horse and one foal. She has a spacious barn to keep the cattle in, and she has also purchased fodder and hay. In addition, Sharshenkul and her family also work with field crop cultivation. They grow clover, beets and beans for own use and sale on their plot of land of 1.20 hectares. The total monthly income is 15,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Sharshenkul turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan of the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase cows. She will also spend part of the money on the purchase of fertilizers and different high quality seeds. Sharshenkul intends to increase the number of cattle, which will led to an increase in the family's capital and enable her to save money for marrying away her son.

loans.use: To buy cow and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 23 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, La clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para poder continuar con su ventas y así obtener mejores ganancias para que ella y su madre puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 22 years old, and she lives in her own house with her mother. She sells clothing on foot throughout the different neighborhoods near her place of residence, and she has many customers because of the quality of the products and the good prices. 

The client is requesting a loan for the purchase of more wholesale clothing so that she can continue with her sales and thus achieve better earnings, so that she and her mother may be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more wholesale clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, needles, and everything needed for sewing

loans.name: Dúo Nueva Vicion De Santiago Group

texts.es: Dúo Nueva Vicion de santiago, representado por doña Raquel Armanda, es madre soltera y ahora solo desea sacar a su último hijo y seguir trabajando pues ella es el pilar de su hogar dos de sus hijos trabajan y la ayudan. Doña Raquel  se dedica a la venta de verduras desde hace 19 años en el mercado municipal de Santiago sac, ella vende tomate, papas, zanahorias, repollos, también frijol en grano, y medicina natural, para la gripe, para las defensas y otros, siempre tiene metas claras y ahora solo desea invertir en su negocio por la época.
texts.en:
Dúo Nueva Vición of Santiago is a duo represented by Doña Raquel Armanda, who is a single mother. At present, she only wishes to help her last child get ahead and to continue working. She is the pillar of her household and two of her children work and help her. 

Doña Raquel has been selling vegetables for 19 years at the city market in Santiago. She sells tomatoes, potatoes, carrots, cabbage and also string beans, along with natural medicine for the flu, immune defense and others. She always has clear goals and now she only wants to invest in her business for the season.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to sell.

loans.name: G.s. La Bendicion De Dios Achuapa Group

texts.es:
G.S la bendición de Dios Achuapa, está conformada por cinco integrantes madres responsables, con diez hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de Achuapa, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.

Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante la cordinadora es Lidia y  tiene por actividad económica  la una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles y en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, detergente, aceite. Ella dedica a su negocio unas doce horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtente mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
The “G.S. la Bendición de Dios Achuapa” communal bank is comprised of five responsible mothers, with ten children under their care.  They are from Achuapa, located in the region’s northern zone.  They are known as being hard working and responsible women who desire to improve themselves.  Regrettably, the member didn’t have the financial resources to study for a degree, and was forced to work from an early age to help with the household expenses.  Now, she strives daily to provide her children with a better future.

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, the leader, Lidia, has a general store business.  It is a small store where she sells groceries such as rice, beans, sugar milk, bread, eggs, detergent, and oil in small quantities.  She works twelve hours a day, selling her products.   The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital and purchase products to stock her business, and then sell the groceries so that, in the near future, she can earn higher income.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and stock her business with  rice, beans, sugar milk, bread, eggs, detergent, and oil.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Munuel tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos. Manuel se gana la vida trabajando como fotógrafo desde hace mucho tiempo. Es muy conocido en la zona donde reside dado que es un hombre integro quien con su amabilidad y buen trato a las personas ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchos y cada día lo prefieren más. Ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio dado que ha visto un aumento en la demanda de sus servicios y como todo hombre emprendedor no quiere dejar pasar esta oportunidad por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en los gastos de revelado, baterías, memorias USB, etc. De esta forma espera cubrir un mayor numero de clientes que le permitan aumentar sus ingresos y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel, 48, lives in his own house with his partner and two children.  Manuel has earned a living as a photographer for a long time.  He is very well-known in the area where he lives because he is an honest man who has gained the confidence of a lot of people thanks to his friendly nature and good service.

He has taken the decision to invest in his business because he has seen an increase in demand and as any business-minded person, he doesn’t want to let the opportunity pass by.  He is asking for a loan from FUSAI to invest in business expenses such as development of photos, batteries, memory sticks, etc.  Therefore, he hopes to satisfy a greater number of customers and earn more profits which will help him offer his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to invest in business expenses such as development of photos, batteries, memory sticks, etc.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es: Don Ignacio es habitante de una comarca cercana al municipio de El Rama, es un pequeño productor quien ordeña su hato ganadero y da mantenimiento a su cultivo de cacao, con esta actividad económica  mantiene los gastos de su familia que la conforma su esposa e hija quien está en edad escolar, Ignacio solicita el crédito para fortalecer su cultivo de cacao invirtiendo en fertilizantes, una podadora así como el pago de mano de obra para realizar la poda y regulación de sombra, Ignacio tiene la seguridad que con esta mejora podrá salir adelante con su cultivo, gracias al financiamiento a largo plazo.
texts.en:
Ignacio lives in a region close to the El Rama municipality. He is a small producer who organizes his herd of cattle and maintains his cocoa crops. He provides for his family, which consists of his wife and his school-age daughter, with this occupation. 

Ignacio is requesting the loan to strengthen his cocoa crops, investing in fertilizers, a lawn-mower, as well as labor costs to carry out the pruning and to control the shade. Ignacio is certain that this upgrade will allow him to get ahead with his crops, thanks to the long-term funding.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, a lawn-mower, as well as labor costs.

loans.name: G.s Divino Niño Achuapa Group

texts.es:
El g.s. Divino Niño Achuapa está conformado por seis integrantes  cuatro hombres y dos mujeres, padres y madres responsables con ocho hijos bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios de Achuapa, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte de la región. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadores, responsables con ganas de superación de personal. En sus ratos libre le gusta disfrutar de la compañía de sus hijos. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a  trabar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar.
la cordinadora es Oneyda y Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante y tiene por actividad económica la venta de cerdos en pie.  Ella dedica a su negocio unas diez horas diarias, ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de un lote de cerdos para  la crianza y venta, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El g.s. Divino Niño Achuapa agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a persona de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Divino Niño Achuapa is made up of six members; four men and two women who are mothers and fathers and are collectively responsible for eight children. They are from Achuapa which is located in the northern part of the region. They are responsible, hard workers, with a strong desire for personal advancement. They enjoy spending their free time with their children.

The leader is Oneyda. Unfortunately, due to lack of financial resources, she was unable to further her studies and had to work starting at a young age to help with household expenses. Thanks to her efforts and her desire to get ahead, she has been able to earn money by selling pigs. She spends 10 hours every day selling her products. The purpose of the loan is to invest in working capital so she can supply her business with a batch of pigs to raise and sell, so that in the not-too-distant future she will have a better income. 

The solidarity group Divino Niño Achuapa is appreciative of the help Kiva investors offer to people of scarce financial resources and in poor countries such as Nicaragua, so that they may earn a living in a dignified way.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to stock her business by buying pigs to raise and sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilisers, organic compost and traps, and to pay the workforce.

loans.name: El  Aguacatillo Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por tres socios laboriosos y coordinado por la señora María  de 42 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos de las edades de 22 y 17 anos quienes han sido su fortaleza y motivo de superación, se dedica a comercializar almohada y semillas de diversas frutas en los mercados del país, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima como es la tela, espuma, hilo y diversas semillas como la de marañón; la socia por medio de los créditos otorgados ha logrado mejorar su vivienda, siendo ella un ejemplo de superación. Otra socia es la señora Ana de 54 años de  edad comerciante de pinol y pinolillo en las calles de su comunidad y vivienda, y el último socio es el señor Danny de 26 anos comerciante de almohadas por encargo, tambien trabaja de mesero en una posada ecológica del municipio siendo este otro ingreso que le ayuda a mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
This group consists of three industrious members. The group coordinator, Sra. María, is a 42-year-old single mother of two children (ages 22 and 17). They give her the strength and the motivation to succeed. She sells pillows and different fruit seeds at markets across the country. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy materials such as fabric, foam, thread, as well as different seeds, such as cashews. With the other loans she has received, María has been able to make improvements to her home. She is an example of success.

The other members are as follows:
• Sra. Ana is 26 years old is a merchant who sells “pinol” and “pinolillo” (both are traditional beverages made from corn and cacao) on the streets in her community and from her home.
• Sr. Danny is 44 years old and a merchant who sells pillows on order. He also works as a waiter at an eco-hotel in town, which provides additional income for supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy materials for making pillows and cashews to sell.

loans.name: Julian Salvador

texts.es: Don Julián Salvador es un agricultor y ganadero, tiene 55 años de edad y habita en la comarca Talolinga del municipio de Nueva Guinea. Su esposa y él se criaron bajo las enseñanzas de la ganadería y esto mismo les enseña a sus seis hijos que también apoyan en las actividades de la finca.  Julian quiere diversificar su producción con la integración del cultivo de cacao que desde pocos años desarrolla junto a su trabajadora familia que ama la producir leche y carne producto de la ganadería. Hoy tiene la necesidad de invertir para mejorar las condiciones de una parcela de 2 manzanas de cacao, comprando insumos como fertilizantes, agroquímicos para el control de plagas y enfermedades, herramientas de trabajo y contratar mano de obra que realice la limpieza y la aplicación de dichos insumos.
texts.en:
Don Julián Salvador is a farmer and rancher. He is 55 years old and lives in the region of Talolinga in the Nueva Guinea municipality. Him and his wife grew up learning about the ranch. He teaches his six children the same, who support the business of the estate.

Julián wants to diversify his production by integrating the cocoa farming, which he has been developing for a few years with his hard-working family who loves to produce milk and meat, which are the products of farming.

Today he needs to invest to improve the state of a plot of two blocks of cocoa by buying materials such as fertilizer, crop chemicals to control plagues and disease, tools for work and to hire skilled labor to perform cleanup and to apply the listed materials.

loans.use: to control plagues and disease, tools for work and to hire labor to clean and apply the materials in the cocoa plot

loans.name: Los Pinoleros Group

texts.es: Este grupo está integrado por cinco socios trabajadores y coordinado por el señor Jairo de 32 años de edad, acompañado y padre de tres hijos de las edades de 6, 5 y 2 años, se dedica a la compra-venta de pan en un tramo ubicado en la municipalidad y en las calles de su comunidad, cuenta con la ayuda de su acompañante de vida e hijo mayor para comercializar el producto.El credito lo invertira en la compra de pan como pan dulce, pan simple en barra, empanadas de queso, roscas bañadas, pico tostado etc. Los otros socios son el señor Eduardo de 41 años de edad dedicado a la compra-venta de frutas por temporadas, la señora María de 49 años comerciante de frutas y verduras en la capital, señor Isel de 41 años ofrece collares y pulseras en el volcán Masaya, y la señora María de 29 años que ofrece ropa nueva para damas y niños, también elabora accesorios para el cabello.
texts.en: This group is formed by five working partners and is coordinated by 32 year old Jairo, who has a domestic partner and is father of three children of 6, 5 and 2 years of age. He works buying and selling bread in the area located in the municipality and streets of his community. He has the help of his domestic partner and his older son to sell his product. The credit will help him buy bread such as sweet breads, breadsticks, cheese empanadas, "roscas bañadas", and "pico tostado" (pastries). The other partners are Eduardo, 41 years old, who works buying and selling seasonal fruits; Maria, 49 years old, who sells fruits and vegetables in the capital; Isel, 41 years old, who offers necklaces and bracelets at the Masaya volcano, and Maria, 29 years old, who sells new clothing for women and children and also makes hair accessories.

loans.use: to buy buy bread such as sweet breads, breadsticks, cheese empanadas, "roscas bañadas", and "pico tostado" (pastries)

loans.name: Roobie Rouze

texts.en:
Becoming an IT graduate is now feasible for Roobie Rouze. 

She attended summer class to enhance her knowledge. To  pay for the summer tuition fees, she took another loan from GDMPC. She always want to become successful in the future.

She thanks GDMPC for helping students to pursue ambitions for a better future.

loans.use: to pay summer tuition fees.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 58 años y vive en el distrito de Padre Abad, es un hombre muy trabajador, día a día se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante, ya que es padre de familia y la fuente de sustento de su hogar; con mucho esfuerzo Manuel trabaja en su pequeño negocio de pesca desde hace 10 años; con lo cual puede tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Manuel esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le ha brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda e implementar algunas herramientas para su negocio, con lo cual mejorara su calidad de vida y podrá mejorar su negocio; así el seguirá trabajando y luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Manuel is 58 years old. He lives in the district of Padre Abad. Manuel is hardworking; day after day he works to move forward because he is the head of his family and the source of his household income. With much dedication, Manuel has worked in his small fishing business for 10 years. This business provides income so he can get ahead. Manuel is grateful to Kia lenders because, thanks to the support that has been offered to him, he will be able to make some improvements on his home and use some tools for his business that will help him improve his quality of life and his business. 

Manuel will continue working and fighting to achieve his biggest dream: to finish building his house.

loans.use: to improve his house and to buy tools for his business.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is 42 years old and lives in Hoima Uganda. She sells food items and owns a butcher shop. She began her  farming and selling porridge business, but  then expanded to start a butcher shop.

She desires to educate her children to higher levels and buy land for a good shelter. Bad debtors, theft and limited capital hinder her business.

She requests a loan to buy animals to butcher and food items to sell.

loans.use: to buy more animals to butcher and buy more food items to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 53 years old, married and has six children.  

She and her family survived super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013, but her business and family home were wiped out. 

Elizabeth is taking out a housing loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase building materials and pay construction labor costs to build a house for her family. 

She has been an NWTF borrower since cycle 1 and plans to recover through her general store business.

With your help, Elizabeth can rebuild her house and rebound from the devastation of super typhoon Haiyan. In the future She  would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay construction labor costs.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth used the previous loan to buy drugs for her business.  This business helps to supplement her income.

Her challenge is inadequate capital and competition from free services at government hospitals. However, she has a vision of educating her children.

Elizabeth needs a loan to buy drugs to restock her pharmacy's inventory.

loans.use: to buy drugs for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, está solicitando un nuevo crédito para invertirlo en el cultivo de granos básicos comprara abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, semilla de maíz y frijol, para seguir trabajando.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a incrementar los cerdos y darles un buen cuido, las ventas le dieron los recursos económicos con la que aseguro la alimentación de su familia y pudo remodelar su casa.
texts.en:
Victor is requesting this new loan to invest in cultivating staple grains, buy manure, fertilizer, insecticide, and corn and bean seeds to continue working.

The previous loan helped him to grow his pigs and give them good care. The sales gave him the financial resources with which he was able to provide for his family’s nutrition and renovate his house.

loans.use: buy manure, fertilizer, insecticide, and corn and bean seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new industrial stove with a griddle and supplies to produce sales.

loans.name: José Gilberto

texts.es:
José, estudio hasta tercer grado de educación básica, esta acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tienen tres hijos de los cuales solamente dos viven en su casa; ya que la tercera hija esta acompañada y tiene su propio hogar, de los dos menores, uno ya es bachiller y el otro estudia educación básica; solamente depende su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos menores de edad. 

José trabaja con ganado de repasto y también se dedica a la agricultura, y lo ha hecho por mucho tiempo y lo aprendió de su padre y decidió hacerlo para tener una fuente de ingresos para poder subsistir; además cuenta con una vaca lechera. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una ternera más; el préstamo le mejorara ya que tendrá mas ganado y por lo tanto tendrá mas ingresos económicos para así poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. La necesidad del cliente es tener mas ganado y con el préstamo comprarlo de una vez. Sus sueños son poder tener mas vacas lecheras para tener producción de lácteos en la comunidad, además de que sus hijos estudien y se preparen.
texts.en:
José, studied until the 3rd grade of elementary school. He has a partner and she is a homemaker. They have three children, of whom only two are living at home. His oldest daughter is married and has her own home. The two that live at home are in high school and elementary school. His partner and these two children depend on him.
José works with cattle on pasture land and also is a farmer. He also has a dairy cow. He has done this work for a long time. He learned it from his father and decided to do it to have an income to survive. 
He is asking for a loan from CrediCampo to buy a calf. The loan will improve his business because it will give him more cattle and, therefore, more income in order to give his family a better quality of life. He needs to have more cattle and, with the loan, he can buy them all at once. His dreams are to have more dairy cows for milk production in the community and to have his children study and prepare for life.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Zuurakan

texts.ru: Зууракан 46 лет, образование среднее, мать 2 детей. Животноводством занимается на протяжении 24 лет. На сегодняшний день в своем хозяйстве имеет 3 дойные коровы, 5 овец, 1 лошадь и 10 коз. Есть все условия для содержания скота, корм и сено заготовлены. Зууракан знает технологию ведения животноводческой деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. Ее ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку лошадей. Зууракан намерена увеличить поголовье скота. Доходы от кредита позволят ей накопить средства на свадьбу сына.
texts.en:
Zuurakan is 46 years old, has secondary education, and is the mother of two children. She has worked with livestock breeding for a period of 24 years. She currently has three dairy cows, five sheep, one horse and 10 goats at her farm. She also has all conditions for breeding livestock, and she has fodder and hay. Zuurakan knows the technology of managing livestock, and knows where to invest resources. Her total monthly income is around 10,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Zuurakan turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase horses. Zuurakan intends to increase the number of livestock. The income from the loan will allow her to save money for her son's wedding.

loans.use: To buy horses

loans.name: Ana Marilú

texts.es:
Ana de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta 2° grado sus padres ya no quisieron ponerla a estudiar por el tiempo que se estaba viviendo con la delincuencia.  Ella está casada desde hace 14 años y su esposo se dedica a trabajar como seguridad en la ciudad, con él han procreado 2 hijas una de ellas tiene 11 años y estudia 7° grado y la otra tiene 5° años y está cursando 1° grado ellos son una familia muy unida ya que por el trabajo el esposo casi no pasa en la casa durante el día ella tiene que hacerse cargo de todos los compromisos del hogar.
	
Ana se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a administrar una pequeña tienda con la cual ella ayuda a los gastos del hogar con las ganancias,  así no se siente tan dependiente solo de su esposo, esto ella lo aprendió hace 6 años que trabajo en una tienda;  pero decidió poner su propio negocio en casa donde podía vender y cuidar de su familia al mismo tiempo ella también aparte de su tienda vende productos por catálogo de los cuales también tiene un ingreso extra el cual le sirve para sus gastos personales, en la tienda solo se involucra ella ya que su esposo no tiene tiempo para hacerlo por su trabajo.

Con el crédito ella comprara los fertilizantes y herbicidas para el cultivo de maíz así como el pago de mano de obra, ya que a pesar de no tener el tiempo necesario para cultivar la tierra de parte de su esposo ella cultiva maíz y frijol con ayuda de personas que ella busca para dichos trabajos.  Con el crédito ella comprara todos los productos que necesita de una sola vez a un precio más bajo percibiendo una pequeña ganancia con la compra, teniendo todo esto en su casa ella al momento de aplicar el producto a su cultivo ya no tendrá que andar a la carrera buscando el fertilizante solo será de trasladarlo de su casa.

Ella quiere para su futuro que su tienda siga creciendo más y más para así tener un mejor ingreso de dinero con las ganancias de las ventas, quiere que sus hijas terminen sus estudios que a ella le fueron negados por sus padres para que ellas tengan un trabajo estable y que sean bien remunerados, además desea que sus esfuerzos en la agricultura sean bien recompensados con una producción abundante para que su familia tenga el sustento.
texts.en:
Ana is 33 years old and studied just to the 2nd grade. Her parents didn't want her to attend school at a time which was filled with delinquency. She has been married for the last 14 years and her husband works as a security guard in the city. With him, Ana has procreated 2 daughters, one of whom is 11 years old and in the 7th grade, while the other is 5 and in the 1st grade. They are a very united family, even though her husband's work doesn't allow him to spend much time at home. She has to take change of all household obligations.
	
Ana does all the household tasks and, in addition, administers her small store by means of which she adds to household earnings. This way, she doesn't feel so dependent on her husband. This skill she learned some 6 years ago while working in a store. Then she decided to establish her own store in her house where she could sell and care for the family at the same time. Ana also, in addition to her store, sells products by catalog which produce extra income to cover her personal expenses. She is the only person involved in the store, because her husband lacks the time to do so due to his work.

With this loan, Ana will purchase fertilizers and herbicides for cultivating corn and to pay laborers. Since her husband doesn't have time to cultivate the earth, she grows corn and beans with the help of workers she searches for to do the tasks. With the loan, Ana will buy all the agricultural inputs needed at one time at a lower price, receiving a small savings on the purchase. By having all this in her house at the moment of application to the crops, she will not have to go looking for fertilizers. Rather, she will be able to transfer the chemicals directly from home.

For the future, Ana wants her store to continue growing more and more to have a better monetary income with earnings from sales. She wants her daughters to complete their studies, which was denied her by her parents, and for them to have stable, well-remunerated work. And, Ana wants her agricultural efforts to be  well compensated with an abundance of production, so that her family can sustain themselves.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides for cultivating corn and to pay farm workers.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa owns and operates a retail business to earn a living. For ten years in running the business, she was able to sustain it and had successfully repaid her previous loan used for buying stocks for sale. She is thsnkful to GDMPC for making small entrepreneurs a chance to improve their ability to engaged business. To improve sales, she took a new loan to purchase additional grocery goods to sell. In the future, she wants to make improvements on her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell

loans.name: Lilly

texts.en:
Lilly has operated her own farm while her husband works overseas. For more than eight years, she was able to sustain the farm and had successfully repaid her previous loan used to purchase farm supplies. She wants to continue the good harvest that contributed much to meet the family's daily living needs. 

To prepare for the next planting season, she took a new loan to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides. 

In the future, Lilly wants to improve her house and the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides.

loans.name: Valary

texts.en:
Valary is a married woman with 3 children. 

She operates a retail business to sell fish. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a viable location. She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient funds. 

She will use 20,000 KES to buy fish. Her business goal is to have a bigger store within 5 years. She will use the anticipated profits to buy more stock.

She hopes that in the future, she will have a stable family income. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a thirty-year-old married female with three children; two attend school. 

She has sold fresh foods for two years and works seven days a week, eleven hours a day.  Her business is located in the market; in addition, she farms to earn additional income. 

Agnes hopes to expand her business, however, the lack of investment capital is a challenge that affects her business growth. Agnes is a hardworking woman and needs a loan to buy onions and tomatoes for the marketplace.

loans.use: to buy onions and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 43 years old and married with one child in school.  Lolita works very hard to provide for them.

Lolita's business and family home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Lolita has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Lolita has requested a 9,090 PHP housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay construction labor costs.

Lolita is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay construction labor costs.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a thirty-year-old married female with two children; all attend school.

She has been in the bar business for two years and works seven days a week, twelve hours a day. Juliet hopes to expand her business however, competition and bad debtors are challenges she faces. 

Juliet is a hardworking woman and asks for a loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to pay   school fees for her children.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a single woman with one child who attends school. She lives in her own house that is without running water and electricity. 

Mariam has operated a beauty salon business for four years. Her potential customers are women. She dreams of earning more income and building her own house in the future. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase braids, weaves, hair chemicals, hair oil, shampoo and hair conditioners. 

She decided to join Yehu to get financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase braids, weaves, hair chemicals, hair oil, shampoo and hair conditioners.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 29-year-old single young man from Attel, a small village near the city of Tulkarm. He lives with his family in an old house in the city. 

Alaa opened his auto repair business seven years ago. He learned this from his father. It is a good business and earns a good income. 

Alaa took a USD loan from FATEN to buy repair parts for his auto repair workshop. This loan will enable Alaa to improve his workshop and increase  productivity.

loans.use: to buy repair parts for his auto repair workshop.

loans.name: Maira Dalila

texts.es:
La señora Maira Dalila  de 35  años  de edad vive con su conyugue, tiene 03 hijos que dependen de ella   tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 04 años al negocio de la venta de golosinas como tajadas de plátanos en bolsa, vende tortillas, se dedica desde hace 03 años a la actividad de venta de tortillas que tambien le da ingresos para mantener a su familia, doña Maira es prácticamente una madre soltera ya que le  ha tocado duro crecer a sus hijos porque su esposo casi no le apoya económicamente.
Doña Maira está solicitando el préstamo para compra de plátano verde, leña, manteca, maíz, cal, verduras, etc.  Con el apoyo del crédito ella mejorara su negocio y con las ganancias mejorara su calidad de vida.
Doña Maira sueño es tener una familia saludable y prospera.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014.
texts.en:
Maira Dalila, 35 years old, lives with her spouse. She has 3 children who depend on her. She has her own home, and for the past 4 years, she has made her living selling snacks like fried plantains in a bag, and tortillas. She has been selling tortillas for 3 of the years that helps her increase her earnings to take care of her family.

Maira is practically a single mother, since it has been very difficult for her to raise her children, because her husband provides almost no financial support.

Maira is applying for the loan to buy green plantains, firewood, shortening, corn, lime, vegetables, etc. With the support of the loan, she will improve her business, and with the earnings, she will improve her quality of life.

Her dream is to have a healthy and prosperous family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -- March 2014

loans.use: to buy green plantains, firewood, shortening, corn, lime, vegetables, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy charcoal and vegetable oil.

loans.name: Santa Margarita

texts.es:
La señora Santa Margarita  de 35  años  de edad es casada, tiene 4 hijos que dependen de ella, vive con su esposo   en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 3 años al negocio de venta de cuajada y ta,bien vende leña seca desde hace mas de 10 años, sus clientes les prefieren por su atención y seriedad al momento de hacer los tratos, doña Santa es un mujer emprendedora que ha salido adelante gracias a la ayuda de Dios y su esfuerzo. 
Doña Santa esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de 240 botellas de leche y un lote de leña para cortarla y luego revenderla, con el apoyo del crédito ella  mejorar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
Su sueño es mejorar su casa y comprar un carro para poder repartir su producto.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014.
texts.en:
Santa Margarita is 35 years old, is married and has four children who depend on her. She lives with her husband in their home. For the last three years she has made a living from a business selling homemade cheese for 3 years and dry firewood for over 10 years. Her customers prefer her for her customer service and seriousness when making transactions. Santa is an enterprising woman who has gotten ahead thanks to God's help and her efforts.
 
Santa is asking for the loan to buy 240 bottles of milk and a flat of firewood to cut and then resell. With the support of the loan she hopes to improve her earnings and thus her quality of life.

Her dream is to improve her house and to buy a car to be able to distribute her product.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2014.

loans.use: to buy 240 bottles of milk and a flat of firewood to cut and then resell for her business

loans.name: Benter

texts.en:
Benter is a 34-year-old married woman with 3 children. She describes herself as dedicated. 

She operates a retail business to sell fish. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located in a viable location and her primary customers are the general public.

 She describes her biggest business challenge to be the changing seasons, which affect sales. She will use 40,000 KES to buy  fish. Her business goal is to expand within 5 years. 

She hopes that in the future, she will succeed. This is her first loan with SMEP Micro finance Bank. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam is a 31-year-old married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be optimistic. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a vibrant location and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to own a boutique within five years. This is her seventh loan with SMEP Micro Finance Bank. Previous loans were paid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 58 years old, married and has four children.

Nelly is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Nelly requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Nelly has been raising pigs for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Nelly would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Njerika

texts.en: Njerika is a 35-year-old married female with five children who all go to school. She has been selling fresh food for two years, working seven days a week and twelve hours a day in the market. Njerika hopes to expand her business even though inadequate capital and the perishability of her products are hardships she faces. Njerika intends to use the loan to buy tomatoes and beans to sell.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes and beans to sell.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan, es una persona responsable y trabajadora, él junto a sus hermanos han tenido que luchar para llevar el ingreso a su familia, creció junto a sus cuatro hermanos, tres hombres y una mujer, desde  muy pequeño tuvo que trabajar duro para ayudar a sus otros hermanos, porque a temprana edad quedaron sin padres. Así  Juan tuvo que dejar por un lado sus estudios.

Desde temprana edad ha trabajado en la agricultura, aprendió esta actividad gracias a su tío, que los apoyo. Además, trabaja como corralero en haciendas aledañas, donde se ha ganado la confianza y siempre es solicitado sus servicios.


Necesita el dinero para la compra de insumos agrícolas / fertilizante, semilla, productos fito sanitarios, entre otros, ya que se acerca la época de  siembra y debe de estar preparado para aprovechar las primeras lluvias. 

Su sueño es poder contar con su propio terreno donde cultivar, ya que en la actualidad, cada año tiene que alquilar donde cultivar, y además no se puede tener los mejores suelos, ya que quien arrenda selecciona lo mejor para él y dejando para el alquiler terrenos pedregosos y pobres.

En la foto él esta arreglando unos bloques de cemento en su casa.
texts.en:
Juan is a responsible and hard-working person. He and his siblings have had to struggle to bring income to their family. He grew up with his four siblings: three brothers and a sister. From when he was very young he has had to work hard to help his brothers and sister, because they were left without parents when they were very young. Because of this, Juan had to put his studies to one side.

From an early age he worked in agriculture. He learned this activity thanks to his uncle, who supported them. He also works with livestock in nearby haciendas, where he has gained their trust and where his services are always requested.

He needs the money to buy agricultural supplies - fertilizer, seed, pesticides etc. -  as planting season approaches and he must be prepared to take advantage of the first rains.

His dream is to have his own land where he can grow crops, as at present he has to rent land each year to grow crops and also may not have the best soils, because the owner of the land selects the best for himself and rents out the stony and poor soils .

In the photo, he is arranging blocks of cement in his house.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies - fertilizer, seed, pesticides etc. -  as planting season approaches and he must be prepared to take advantage of the first rains.

loans.name: Reina Gloria

texts.es:
Reina de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta 1er grado. Es acompañada  su esposo trabaja de recolector de basura en la alcaldía. Tiene tres hijos, el 1ro trabaja, la segunda estudia noveno grado, la tercera estudia octavo grado.

   La señora se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos junto a su esposo, desde que eran joven se dedica a esta actividad más que todo a la siembra de frijol aprendió de su padre ya que él realizaba esta actividad y ella siempre iba a dejarle los alimentos con sus hermanos. Decidió dedicarse a ello porque no tienen otra actividad productiva. Antes solo era doméstica y no tiene otra actividad. El lugar donde trabajan le queda a medio km de su casa, y viaja a pie, su esposo es quien la apoya en las actividades que realiza. Generalmente trabaja de 7 a 12 del mediodía.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar fertilizantes, herbicidas, foliares, y pagar parte de la mano de obra que necesitara para realizar las labores agrícolas, será satisfecha la necesidad de comprar todo lo que requiere el cultivo, también comprara una refrigeradora para conservar mejor sus alimentos.


Su sueño es ayudar con todo sacrificio a sus hijas, para que puedan sacar una carrera universitaria y que en un futuro puedan ayudarle a ella cuando ya no pueda realizarse, y lo hará con la ayuda de su esposo y su hijo mayor.

la señora se llama Reina Gloria
texts.en:
Reina who is 45 years studied until the first grade. She is accompanied by her spouse who is a trash collector in the city hall. She has three children, the first works, the second studies in the ninth grade, and the third in the eighth grade.

Alongside her spouse, she makes a living planting and sowing basic grains, mostly beans. She has been doing this work since she was young. She learned from her father since this is what he did, and this work always left food for her siblings. Not having any other productive activity she decided to do this for a living, before that she worked in domestics. The place where she works is half a kilometer away from her home, and she commutes by walking. Her spouse is who supports her in everything that she does. She generally works 7am to 12 in the afternoon.

The loan that she requests from CrediCampo is to purchase plant fertilizers, herbicides, and pay for part of the necessary agricultural labor. This will satisfy the amount needed to purchase everything that is required to cultivate, as well as a refrigerator to better conserve her food. 

Her dream is to help her children above everything, so that they get a university degree and so that in the future they can help her. She will do this with the help of her husband and her eldest child.  

The borrower's name is Reina Gloria.

loans.use: buy fertilizer, herbicides, foliar, and pay part of the manpower needed for farming and also to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto de 33 años de edad,  está acompañado. Tiene un hijo. Su compañera de vida se dedica a cuidar a su hijo y la casa, él solamente estudio hasta tercer grado ya que la escuela le quedaba demasiado lejos y también porque sus padres no lo dejaban estudiar.

Él se dedica a la agricultura. Desde hace más de quince años sus padres le enseñaron  esta  actividad, además de eso  trabaja de ayudante de albañil en el cantón donde él vive.

 El  crédito lo necesita  para seguir trabajando en la agricultura en la siembra de granos básicos. Maíz,  frijol,  entre otras, específicamente comprara abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra.  Con lo cual obtendrá mejores ingresos y así ayudara más a su familia y vivir mejor. Sus sueños  son que su hijo estudie y que en el futuro sea un profesional, ya que él no lo pudo ser.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 33 years old and lives with his life partner and their son. She works taking care of the child and the home. He only has a third grade education because his school was too far and his parents didn't let him go.

He works farming. He learned this business from his parents over fifteen years ago. He also works as a helper in construction in the canton where he lives.

He needs this loan in order to keep working on his farm by growing basic grains like corn, beans, and other crops. Specifically, he will buy fertilizer, pesticides, and weed killers. He will also pay for labor. This will allow him to obtain better income in order to help his family more and live better. He would like his son to go to school and have a career in the future, since he wasn't able to do it.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides and weed killers, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Medardo Osmin

texts.es:
Medardo de 23 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, ya tiene seis años de estar acompañado y tiene un hijo de tres años de edad, aun no lo envian al kinder porque esta muy pequeño, su madre padece de una enfermedad y ella necesita tener el tratamiento y el cuando puede le ayuda con los medicamentos, Medardo se dedica a la agricultura desde el año 2011, esto lo aprendio de sus padres ya que ellos a eso se han dedicado a esto desde hace unos 20 años aproximadamente.

Medardo ya tiene tres años de dedicarse a la agricultura al no poder estudiar, a tenido que dedicarse a la agricultura para sobrevivir, para las temporadas de café aprobecha y va con su compañera de vida,  a cortar y lo que sacan de la corta una parte para la comida y la otra parte para lo que gastan en la persona que le ayuda a Medardo en la siembra.

Él préstamo lo utilizara para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde va a sembrar que son 21,0000 metros cuadrdaos de tierra, comprara seis sacos de abono, tres de formula, tres de sulfato y pago del alguiler del terro. Si le aprueban el préstamo se beneficiara de gran manera, ya que podra cultivar. su madre esta enferma y el con lo poquito que gana le ayuda a su madre a comprar medicamentos para su enfermedad.
sus sueños son comprar un terreno y poder construir su casita en mejores condiciones, ayudarle a su madre con los gastos que tiene en su enfermedad.
texts.en:
Medardo, age 23, attended school up to grade 2. He has been in a relationship for six years and has a three-year-old child who is not in school yet because he is still little. Medardo's mother is ill and needs treatment. When he can, Medardo helps with the medicines. Medardo has worked in agriculture since 2011. He learned this work from his parents, since they have been farmers for about 20 years.
Medardo has already been working in agriculture for three years because he could not study. He has had to work in agriculture in order to survive. In the coffee season he enjoys going with his life partner to harvest. They save some for themselves and use the rest to cover their costs and pay for their helper.
Medardo will use this loan to pay the rent on his farmland, which is 210000 square metres. He will buy six bags of fertilizer, three of formula, and three of sulphate. If approved, this loan will be greatly beneficial to him; he will be able to farm. His mother is sick, and with the small amount that he earns he helps his mother to buy medicines for her illness.
His dreams are to buy a plot of land and to be able to build a small house in better conditions, as well as to help his mother with the costs of her illness.

loans.use: to buy six bags of fertilizer, three bags of formula and three of sulphate, and to pay rent on the land.

loans.name: Eris Iveth

texts.es:
Eris de 29 años de edad, es una joven que estudio bachillerato,  actualmente está acompañada el esposo se dedica a la agricultura, han procreado 1 hijo.

por el momento ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos,  pero le ayuda al esposo a la agricultura, ya que desde hace 7 años están juntos han decidido trabajar la tierra. 

El préstamo solicitado lo necesitara para comprar abono, pesticidas, herbicidas, semilla, ect.  para que el esposo cultive y así sacar  una buena cosechar y tendrán un ingreso más,  porque cultivaran 21,000 metros cuadrados  de maíz y también de eso van a buscar personas que le ayuden a trabajar la tierra, para que no se les haga el trabajo solo a ellos esto lo lograran con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio.
texts.en:
Eris is 29 years old and is a young woman who studied through high school.  Currently she lives with her husband who works in agriculture, and they have a 1 year old son.  

She currently works at home, but she also helps her husband with farming, since they have been together for 7 years and they have decided to work the land.  She works solely in this area.  

The loan that she is requesting will be used to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, seeds, etc. so that her husband will be able to plant and have a good harvest and earn more income.  They will cultivate 21,000 square meters of corn and also they will look for people to help them work the land.  This will allow them to have assistance and to benefit from their hard work and sacrifice.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, herbicides, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Vilma Aida

texts.es:
vilma de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, es casada tiene 3 hijos y uno que esta esperando ya serian 4, ya tiene 5 meses de embarazo. Dos niñas y un niño, las edades de ellos son de 11 , 10 y 5 años de edad ella trabaja duro para mantener a su familia, vendiendo productos por catalogo, ya tiene 3 años de dedicarse a ese negocio. Ella sale a las comunidades mas cercanas, para promocionar el producto ya que a ella le pagan dependiendo lo que venda, entonces ella debe rebuscarse para vender bastante y así poder obtener mejores ganancias, y poder darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida. 

Sus dos niñas estudian y el último va a un centro de bienestar infantil, ella dice que se ayuda mucho con eso porque solo tiene que rebuscarse, para la cena ya que el desayuno y almuerzo su niño lo hace ahí.

 Ella solicito el prestamo para comprar una medicina que necesita para su salud, ella tiene anemia y por su embarazo el medico, le recomendó un tratamiento y ella no cuenta con el dinero necesario, su esposo ahorita no trabaja porque tubo un accidente y por el golpe que se dio en su pierna no puede trasladarse a su trabajo, que es en la finca.

Sus sueños son tener una tienda para  generar mas ingresos para mantener a su familia, dice que va luchar por sus hijos para que no tengan la vida que ella tiene, ya que no disfrtuto de su juventud porque desde sus 12 años de edad le a tocado trabajar.
texts.en:
Vilma is 28 years old and educated up to sixth grade. She is married with three children and another one on the way, as she is five months pregnant. So far she has two girls and a boy, who are 11, 10, and 5 years old. She works hard to provide for her family, and for three years she has earned her living selling products by catalogue. She travels to nearby communities to promote her products and her income depends on what she sells, so she strives to make good sales and so earn more and give her children a better quality of life.

Her two girls are in school and her little boy attends an infant welfare centre. Vilma says that this helps her a lot as she only has to worry about earning enough for his dinner, as he eats breakfast and lunch there.

She is seeking a loan in order to buy a medicine that she needs for her health. She has anaemia and as she is pregnant her doctor recommended a treatment to her, but she doesn't have the money needed. Her husband is not working at the moment because he had an accident, and due to the blow he received to his leg he is unable to travel to his work on a farm.

Vilma's dream is to have her own shop and so generate a greater income for her family. She says that she will fight hard for her children not to have the same life that she has. She did not enjoy her own youth, as she had to work from the age of 12.

loans.use: to buy a medicine that she needs for her health.

loans.name: Higidia Victoria

texts.es: Higidia tiene 55 años de edad y agradece a todos los inversionista por el préstamo y se siente contenta por el apoyo brindado, ella vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco junto con su familia y se dedica a la venta de desayunos de forma ambulatoria como mates, jugo de quinua y huevo cocido, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Diamantes” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo huevos, quinua, hiervas y otras cosas mas y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Higidia, 55, is grateful to all the lenders for the loan and happy about the support offered.  She lives in the beautiful city of Cusco with her family and makes a living selling breakfast as a street vendor: yerba mate, quinoa juice, and boiled eggs. 

Higidia belongs to Los Diamantes Communal Bank and currently needs the loan to buy ingredients such as eggs, quinoa, herbs, and other items.

She promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as eggs, quinoa, herbs, and other items.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y se dedica a la venta de granos secos como por ejemplo cebada, trigo y tambien se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas y pollos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos y cuyes. 

Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Margarita lives in the beautiful city of Cusco, and makes her living selling dry grains such as barley and wheat. She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs, hens and chickens.

This time she needs the loan to buy chickens and guinea pigs.

Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area, for its traditional Inti Raymi festival, and because one of the seven wonders of the world is found there -- Machupicchu.

loans.use: to buy chickens and guinea pigs

loans.name: Fe Y Confianza Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario está integrado por  tres socios laboriosos, y es coordinado por el señor Mauricio de 50 años de edad, casado y padre de tres hijos se dedica al destace de cerdo y comerciante de madera, solicita el crédito lo solicita principalmente para la compra de madera de cedro y cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa para la comercialización de los productos. Otra de las socias es la señora Socorro de 55 años dedicada a la venta de ropa interior y la señora Silvia de 41 años comerciante de golosinas de manera ambulante.
texts.en:
The solidarity group is made up of 3 hardworking partners. It is coordinated by Mr. Mauricio who is 50 years old. He is married and the father of three children. He is a pig butcher and a lumber salesman. He is requesting this loan primarily to buy cedar and is relying on his wife’s help to sell the product. 

The other members are Mrs. Socorro, of 55 years of age; she sells undergarments and Mrs. Silvia, of 41 years of age who is a sweets street vendor.

loans.use: to buy lumber

loans.name: Aidée

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Aidee con su credikiva, con el cual compró mercancías como ropa, calzado, productos para el hogar, cosméticos y perfumería en general. Su credikiva fortaleció el capital de trabajo y se incrementaron las ventas y las utilidades.  Desde que recibió su crédito cuenta con mayor liquidez y los ingresos familiares han mejorado paulatinamente. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva. “Soy agradecida por el apoyo recibido, sigan haciéndolo para continuar progresando.“ En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, mediante el cual comprará mercancía variada como ropa calzado, para continuar fortaleciendo sus ventas la liquidez y aumentar sus utilidades en el negocio. “
texts.en: Thank you for helping Aidée with her Kiva loan. With it, she bought merchandise such as clothing, home products, cosmetics and perfume in general. Her Kiva loan fortified her working capital and her sales and profits increased. Since she received her Kiva loan she has more liquidity and the family income has slowly improved. She has this message for the Kiva lenders: “I am grateful for the support I have received, keep doing it so I can continue progressing.“ right now she is applying for a Kiva loan with which she will buy assorted merchandise such as clothing and shoes, so that she can continue fortifying her sales and her liquidity and increase her profits in the business.

loans.use: to buy assorted merchandise such as clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Eugenio Espejo  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Eugenio Espejo está formado por 8 socias y 1 socio que gracias a su amistad han conformado este grupo, se dedican a laborar en diferentes actividades como son; venta por catalogo de ropa o cosméticos, comercio u otras actividades las que les permiten mejorar la economía de sus hogares, son mujeres luchadoras ya que a pesar de las adversidades que les presenta la vida siempre están dispuestas a regalar una sonrisa. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene un clima frió, es conocida como la tercera ciudad de mayor importancia económica del país, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tienen varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Blanca, es una mujer amable, gentil que trabaja a diario para mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar, su grupo de crédito Eugenio Espejo le gusta por la unión que existe entre todas las socias, siempre se encuentran en la búsqueda de un mejor porvenir para la superación familiar y espera aportar en este hermoso grupo ya que es su primer crédito.
La Señora Blanca tiene 44 años de edad, está divorciada pero como fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 18, 15 y 9 años, su primer hijo trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente, su segunda hija estudia en el colegio y su ultimo hijo está en una escuelita de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
Doña Blanca hace poco tiempo se está dedicando a la venta de comida, esta actividad le  gusta mucho y poco a poco está obteniendo más clientes, también se dedica a la venta de ropa, trabaja todos los días sin un horario. El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de ropa y ampliar su mercadería para sus clientes. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
La foto pequeña es de dos socias que no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomo la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The loan group "Eugenio Espejo" consists of 8 women and 1 man, who, thanks to their friendship, have formed this group. They work in various activities such as catalog sales of clothing and cosmetics, commerce, and other activities that allow them to improve the economies of their households. They are hard-working women, and in spite of the adversities that life presents them, they are always ready to give a smile. They live in different areas of the city of Cuenca. This city has a cold climate. It is known as the third most important city of the country economically. Since December 1999, it has been a Cultural Heritage of Humanity site. It has various places for enjoying nature.

One of the members of this group is Señora Blanca. She is a kind, gentle woman who works every day to improve the economic stability of her household. She likes her loan group "Eugenio Espejo" because of the unity that exists among all the members. They are always searching for a better future for family improvement, and she hopes to contribute to this beautiful group, since this is its first loan.

Señora Blanca is 44 years old. She is divorced, but from her marriage she has three children, ages 18, 15, and 9. Her oldest son works and helps her economically. Her second child, a daughter, is in school, and her youngest son attends a little school in the city. She doesn't have her own house, so she rents.

Doña Blanca has been selling food for a little while. She likes this business a lot, and little by little she is obtaining more customers. She also sells clothing. She works every day without a schedule. She is going to invest the money from her loan in the purchase of clothing and to expand her merchandise for her customers. Her dream is to have her own house.

The small photo is of two members who were not able to be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es: Wilmer de 37 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias, caracterizada  por hermosas y firmes murallas, que recuerdan gran parte de la historia de Colombia,  en sus numerosos ataques de piratas pues aun mantiene la arquitectura colonial. Allí Wilmer desde hace 8 años emprendió su aventura emprendedora de característica comercial, pues esta actividad ya la había conocido anteriormente.  Su trabajo consiste en vender todo tipo de películas y música en un puesto que ubicó en el barrio donde habita. Sus ventas las realiza todos los días, desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche y sus principales compradores son los transeúntes del sector. Wilmer necesita atraer más clientes con nuevas inversiones y esto es justamente lo que lo impulsa a solicitar su primer financiamiento a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará películas, y un televisor para proyectarlas a su clientela.
